svg.title: `dar-backup` overview
svg.text: dar-backup: Flow, Locations, Lanes, Logging, and Cleanup

g.text: Controls directories, retention, logging, and options

svg.text: runs FULL / DIFF / INCR per definition

g.text: Holds per-definition FULL, DIFF, INCR + par2
Allows .par2 files to be stored away from the dar archives

svg.text: Constraint: If no DIFF exists, no INCR will be created. Seed cycles by running a DIFF.

g.text: • Deletes DIFF and INCR older than configured thresholds
• FULL deletion requires explicit user choice
